thread.title: A Gentle Reminder That Jake Gyllenhaal Is Also an Incredibly Talented Singer
thread.title_full: A Gentle Reminder That Jake Gyllenhaal Is Also an Incredibly Talented Singer

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: A Gentle Reminder That Jake Gyllenhaal Is Also an Incredibly Talented Singer
text:
Jake Gyllenhaal Singing in Sunday in the Park With George A Gentle Reminder That Jake Gyllenhaal Is Also an Incredibly Talented Singer February 7, 2017 by Kelsie Gibson 736 Shares 
Jake Gyllenhaal is one incredibly talented young man. Sure, he's a great actor, but he's also got some killer pipes. On Tuesday, he gave us a quick glimpse of his upcoming stint in the revival of the Broadway musical, Sunday in the Park With George , when he posted a clip of him singing "Finishing the Hat," directed by True Detective 's Cary Fukunaga. Not only does he look incredibly attractive as he waltzes down the staircase during the number, but his voice sounds like a straight-up Disney prince. Needless to say, we're already booking our tickets to NYC to see the show. See you at the stage door, Jake! Related:
